list:
1 khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod paD viśeṣa-stavaD khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa viśeṣa-stava ilanggui-a kedürgei maqtagal
2 khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad paD viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkāD khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkā ilanggui-a kedürgei maqtagal-un aqui yeke nomlal
3 thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya baD sarvajñāmaheśvarastotra-nāmaD thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa sarvajñāmaheśvarastotra-nāma qamuq-i ayiladugci yeke erketü burqan-u maqtagal kemekdekü
4 lha las phul du byung bar bstod paD devātiśayastotraD lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa devātiśayastotra tngri-dece kedürgei bolugsan-u maqtagal
5 lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel paD devātiśayastotra-ṭīkāD lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa devātiśayastotra-ṭīkā tngri-dece kedürgei bolugsan-u maqtagal-un aqui yeke tayilburi
6 sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya baD buddhastotra-nāmaD sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba buddhastotra-nāma burqan-u maqtagal kemegdekü
7 chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod paQ dharmakāyāśrayāsāmānyaguṇastotraQ chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan la bstod pa dharmakāyāśrayāsāmānyaguṇastotra nom-un bey-e-dür orosigsan yerünggei busu erdem-ün maqtagal orosiba
8 de kho na nyid la bstod paD tattvastavaD de kho na nyid la bstod pa tattvastava tere kü cinar-un maqtagal
9 bdud btul ba la bstod paD mārajit-stotraQ bdud btul ba la bstod pa mārajit-stotra [simuq omugadqaqui ta maqtagal]
10 chos kyi dbyings su bstod paD dharmadhātustavaD chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa dharmadhātustotra dharmadhātustava nom-un tüb-ün maqtagal
11 dpe med par bstod paD nirupamastavaD dpe med par bstod pa nirupamastava üliger ügei-yin maqtagal
12 'jig rten las 'das par bstod paD lokātītastavaD 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa lokātītastava yirtincü-ece ögcigsen maqtagal
13 sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod paD cittavajrastavaD sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa cittavajrastava sedkil vcir-un maqtagal
14 don dam par bstod paD paramārthastavaD don dam par bstod pa paramārthastava degedü udq-a-yin maqtagal
15 sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya baD kāyatrayastotra-nāmaD sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba sku gsum la bstod pa kāyatrayastotra-nāma gurban bey-e-yin maqtagal
16 sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel paD kāyatrayastotra-nāma-vivaraṇaD sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa kāyatrayastotra-nāma-vivaraṇa gurban bey-e-yin maqtagal kemegdeküi-yin deyin dayilburi
17 sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod paD sattvārādhanastavaD sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa sattvārādhanastava amitan-i bayasqan üiledügci maqtagal
18 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod paD prajñāpāramitāstotraD shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa prajñāpāramitāstotra bilig baramid-un maqtagal
19 bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod paD acintyastavaD bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa acintyastava sedkisi ügei-yin maqtagal
20 bstod pa las 'das par bstod paD stutyatītastavaD bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa stutyatītastava maqtagal-aca ögcigsen-ü maqtagal
21 bla na med pa'i bstod paD niruttastavaD bla na med pa'i bstod pa bla na med par bstod pa niruttarastava niruttastava dengsel ügei maqtagal
22 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya baD ārya-bhaṭṭārakamañjuśrīparamārthastuti-nāmaD 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba ārya-bhaṭṭārakamañjuśrīparamārthastuti-nāma quduq-tu gedülgegci maYJuSrii-yin ünemleküi maqtagal kemegdekü
23 rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod paD ārya-mañjuśrībhaṭṭārakakaruṇāstotraD rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa ārya-mañjuśrībhaṭṭārakakaruṇāstotra qutuq-tu gedülgegci maYJuSrii-yin örösiyel-dür maqtagal
24 gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod paD aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotraD gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra naiman yeke oron-u soburqan-dur maqtagal
25 gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod paD aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotraD gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra
26 mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod paD dvādaśakāra-nāma-nayastotraD mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa dvādaśakāra-nāma-nayastotra arban qoyar jokiyanggui-yin yosun-dur maqdagsan kemegdekü
27 phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya baD vandanāstotra-nāmaD phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya ba phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa vandanāstotra-nāma mörgül-ün maqtagal kemegdekü
28 dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya baD narakoddhāra-nāmaD dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba dmyal ba nas 'don pa narakoddhāra-nāma tamu-aca gargaqu kemekdekü
29 sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya baD varṇārhavarṇe bhagavato buddhasya stotre 'śakyastava-nāmaD sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa varṇārhavarṇe bhagavato buddhasya stotre 'śakyastava-nāma ilaju tegüs nögcigsen-e maqdagsan sayisiyaqu yokistu-yi sayisiyaqu-aca maqdal ülü cidaqdaqui ta maqdagsan kemegdekü
30 dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod paD triratnamaṅgalastotraD dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa triratnamaṅgalastotra öljei-tü gurban erdeni-yin maqtagal
31 yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod paD samyaksaṃbuddhalakṣaṇastotraD yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa samyaksaṃbuddhaketastotra samyaksaṃbuddhalakṣaṇastotra üneger dogulugsan burqan-u lakSan maqtagal
32 gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod paD ekattarikastavaD gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa ekottarikastotra ekattarikastava nigen-ece- sacuragsan maqtagal
33 bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya baD sugatapañcatriṃśadratnanāmamālāstotraD bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa sugatapañcatriṃśatstotranāmaratnamālā-nāma sugatapañcatriṃśadratnanāmamālāstotra qocin tabun burqan-u maqtagal
34 tshig brgyad pa'i bstod paD padāṣṭakastotraD tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa padāṣṭakastotra naiman silüg-tü maqtagal
35 dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod paD triratnastotraD dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa triratnastotra gurban erdeni-yin maqtagal
36 dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel paD triratnastotra-vṛttiD dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa triratnastotra-vṛtti gurban erdeni-yin maqtagal-un tayilburi
37 dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod paD triratnastotraD dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa triratnastotra gurban erdeni-yin maqtagal
38 brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod paD śatapañcāśatka-nāma-stotraD brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa śatapañcāśatka-nāma-stotra yagun tabitu kemegdekü maqtagal
39 brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel paD śatapañcāśatka-nāma-stotra-ṭīkāD brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa śatapañcāśatka-nāma-stotra-ṭīkā yagun tabi-tu kemegdekü maqtagal-un dayilburi
40 gaN+DI'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad paD gaṇḍīstotragāthāD gang Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa gaN+Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa gaN+DI'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa gaṇḍīstotragāthā GaNDi silüg-ün maqtagal
41 spel mar bstod pa zhes bya baD miśrakastotra-nāmaD spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba miśrakastotra-nāma qulbag-a maqtagal kemegdekü
42 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod paD sarvatathāgatastotraD de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa sarvatathāgatastotra qamuq tegüncilen iregsen-ün maqtagal
43 bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod paD bhagavacchākyamunistotraD bcom ldan 'das sha kya thub pa'i bstod pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bhagavacchākyamunistotra ilaju tegüs nögcigsen SakiamuNi-yin maqtagal
44 yon tan mtha' yas par bstod paD guṇāparyantastotraD yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa guṇāparyantastotra kijagalasi ügei erdem-dür maqtagal
45 yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel paD guṇāparyantastotra-ṭīkāD yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa guṇāparyantastotra-ṭīkā kijagalasi ügei erdem-dür maqtagal-u tayilburi
46 yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas paD guṇāparyantastotrapadakārikāD yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'u byas pa yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas pa guṇāparyantastotrapadakārikā kijagalasi ügei erdem-dür maqtagal-u odq-a-yin üges-i bölüglegsen
47 sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod paD buddhanirvāṇastotraD sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa buddhaparinirvāṇastotra buddhanirvāṇastotra burqan bari nirvan bolugsan-a maqdagsan
48 bshags pa'i bstod paD deśanāstavaD bshags pa'i bstod pa deśanāstava amancilal-un maqtagal
49 bshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel paD deśanāstava-vṛttiD gshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa bshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa deśanāstava-vṛtti amancilal-un maqtagal-un tayilburi
50 sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod paD buddhābhiṣeka-nāma-stotraD sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa buddhābhiṣeka-nāma-stotra burqan erke öggügsen kemegdekü maqtagal
51 bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangsD śrīvajradharasaṃgītibhagavatstotraD bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs śrīvajradharasaṃgītabhagavatstotra śrīvajradharasaṃgītibhagavatstotra ilaju tegüs nögcigsen-dür maqdagsan coqtu vcir barigci-yin egesig
52 bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad paD śrīvajradharasaṃgītibhagavatstotra-ṭīkāD bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad pa śrivajradharasaṃgītabhagavatstotraṭīkā śrīvajradharasaṃgītibhagavatstotra-ṭīkā ilaju tegüs nögcigsen tü maqtagal coqtu vcir barigci-yin egesig-ün aqui yeke nomlal
53 de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bstod paD pañcatathāgatastavaD de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bstod pa pañcatathāgatastava tabun tegüncilen iregsen maqtagal
54 de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod paD saptatathāgatastotraD de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa saptatathāgatastotra dologan tegüncilen iregsen-ü maqtagal
55 de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod paD aṣṭatathāgatastotraD de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod pa aṣṭatathāgatastotra naiman tegüncilen iregsen-ün maqtagal
56 rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod paD suprabhātaprabhātastotraD rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa suprabhātaprabhātastotra suprātaprabhātastotra masi erte ür keyigsen-ü maqtagal
57 gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod paD aṣṭamahāsthānacaityavandanāstavaD gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa aṣṭamahāsthānacaityavandanāstava naiman yeke oron-u suburqan-dur mörgün maqdagsan
58 de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya baD tathāgatanāmasaṃgītikalpikabhadrālaṃkāramālā-nāmaD de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba tathāgatanāmasaṃgītikalpikabhadrālaṃkāramālā-nāma tathāgatanāmasaṅgītikalpikabhadrālaṃkāramālā-nāma tegüncilen iregsen-ün ner-e-yi ögülekü sayin keleb-ün cimeg erike kemegdekü
59 sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya baD yogacaturdevastotra-nāmaD sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa yogacaturdevastotra-nāma terigün barildulg-a-yin tngri ta maqtagal kemegdekü
60 bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya baD paramagurudharmarājastotra-nāmaD bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba sadgurudharmarājastotra-nāma paramagurudharmarājastotra-nāma degedü blam-a nom-un qagan-u maqtagal kemegdekü
61 dus mchod chen po bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas paQ kālapūjā-mahācatuṣka-kārikāQ dus mchod chen po bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas pa dus mchod chen mo bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas pa dus mchod chen kālapūjā-mahācatuṣka-kārikā dörben caq-un yeke dakil-un üges-i bülüglegsen
62 dpal sha kya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya baQ śrī-śākyamunistotra-daśama-nāmaQ dpal sha kya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba dpal shA kya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba dpal shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa śrī-śākyamunistotra-daśama-nāma coqtu SakiamuNi-yin arban silüg tü maqtagal orosiba
63 e ka gA tha'i don 'grelQ ekagāthā-ṭīkāQ e ka gA tha'i don 'grel e ka nA tha'i don 'grel ekagāthāṭīkā E ka na-a ta-yin odq-a-yin tayilburi orosiba
64 bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya baD vimalaprabhā-nāma-mūlatantrānusāriṇīdvādaśasāhasrikā-laghukālacakratantrarā-jaṭīkāD bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba vimalaprabhā-nāma-mūlatantrānusāriṇīdvādaśasāhasrikā-laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkā qoriyanggui tandir-a-yin qagan caq-un kürdün-ü tayilburi nomlagsan arban qoyar minggan tug-a tu ijagur-un öndüsün-i dagan oroqu kkir ügei gerel-tü kemekü
65 dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen paD śrī-paramārthasevāD dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen pa śrī-paramārthasevā coqtu ünemleküi-yin Sarid kemegdekü
66 dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar mi g.yo ba'i snying po snang baD śrīmanvimalaprabhātantrāvatāraṇīvādā-calahṛdayālokaD dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar mi g.yo ba'i snying po snang ba dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar snying po snang ba śrīmadvimalaprabhātantrāvatāraṇīvāda-hṛdayāloka śrīmanvimalaprabhātantrāvatāraṇīvādā-calahṛdayāloka tegün coqtu kkir-aca anggijiragsan gerel-tü dandr-a dur oroqui-yin nomlalg-a-lug-a ayiragulugsan yirüken-i keyigülügci
67 pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grelD padmin-nāma-pañjikaD pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel padmani-nāma-pañjikā padmin-nāma-pañjika lingqu-a-tu neretü jarliq-un tayilburi
68 dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam pa bsdus pa zhes bya baD paramārthasaṃgraha-nāma-sekoddeśa-ṭīkāD dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam pa bsdus pa paramārthasaṃgraha-nāma-sekoddeśa-ṭīkā abisig-i tobcilan üjügülügsen-ü tayilburi nomlal ünemlekü-yi qoriyaqsan kemegdekü
69 dbang mdor bstan pa'i mdor bshadD sekoddeśaṭippaṇīD dbang mdor bstan pa'i mdor bshad mdor bstan pa'i mdor bshad sekoddeśaṭippaṇī abisig-i tobcilan üjügülügsen-ü tobci nomlalg-a
70 dbang mdor bstan pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya baD sekoddeśaṭīkā-nāmaD dbang mdor bstan pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba dbang mdor bstan pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa sekoddeśaṭīkā-nāma abisig tobcilan üjügülügsen-ü aquu yeke tayilburi kemekü
71 dbang mdor bstan pa'i dka' 'grelD sekoddeśapañjikāD dbang mdor bstan pa'i dka' 'grel sekoddeśapañjikā abisig-i tobcilan üjügülügsen-ü berke tayilburi

1761 D D sbyin sreg gi cho ga
1762 D D rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gtum po sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pagtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gtum po khros pa chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīcaṇḍamahā-roṣaṇasādhana-nāma dogsin vcir-iyar teyin böged ebdegci-yin bötögel-ün arg-a kemegdekü
1763 D D rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rim ji lta ba zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīmaṇḍalaprakriyāyathākrama-nāma vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīmaṇḍalapra-kṛyāyathākrama-nāma

1766 D D rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
1767 D D dbang bskur abhiṣeka
1768 D D dam tshig bsrung ba samayarakṣā
1769 D D khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba aṣṭakrodhamaṇḍalābhiṣeka
1770 D D lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba aṣṭadevīmaṇḍalābhiṣeka
1771 D D dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga ekavīramaṇḍalābhiṣekāmṛtakalaśavidhi
1772 D D yab yum gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba bde sbyin dam pa zhes bya ba pitṛmāturubhayamaṇḍalābhiṣekaparama-sukhadāna-nāma
1773 D D bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes bya ba khro ba khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zab mo amṛtakuṇḍalī-nāma-catuṣkrodhamaṇḍalābiṣekagambhīravidhi
1774 D D sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin po che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba caturdvāramaṇḍalābhiṣekamaṇḍalavidhivimalaratna-nāma
1775 D D rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba caturmahārājamaṇḍalābhiṣeka
1776 D D phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga daśadikpālamaṇḍalābhiṣekavidhi
1777 D D gza' chen po brgyad kyi sakyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len zhes bya ba aṣṭamahāgrahamaṇḍalābhiṣekavidhyarkarasāyana-nāma
1778 D D rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje go cha ma zhes bya ba aṣṭāviṃśatinakṣatrābhiṣekamaṇḍalavidhivajravarmiṇī-nāma
1779 D D lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba legs pa'i lam ston par byed pa zhes bya ba aṣṭamahādevamaṇḍalābhiṣekasanmārgadeśaka-nāma
1780 D D klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug las rgyal ba zhes bya ba aṣṭamahānāgamaṇḍalābhiṣekaviṣajin-nāma
1781 D D snga ma dang da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdig pa ma lus pa las thar par byed pa 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa khrus kyi cho ga pūrvavartamānottarāśeṣapāpamocana- āryavajravidāraṇāsnānavidhi
1782 D D 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga āryavajravidāraṇāpratiṣṭhāvidhi
1783 D D dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las la sbyar ba 'grub par nges pa'i cho ga śrīvajravidāraṇākarmopakrama-siddhi-nirṇayavidhi
1784 D D man ngag gi sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang stobs sgrub pa zhes bya ba upadeśasiddhayogyāyurbalasādhana-nāma
1785 D D rgyud kyi bden pa'i don nges par sgrub pa rnal 'byor pa'i pra se na legs par brtag pa tantrasatyārthāvadhārakaprasenayoginirūpaṇā
1786 D D 'dod pa'i don dus la nges par sgrub pa dod pa'i don dus la nges par sgrub pa kāmārthasamayanirdhāraṇa
1787 D D rgyud kyi bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa zhes bya ba tantranirdeśa-nāma-padasampradhāraṇa-nāma
1788 D D rgyud thams cad thogs pa med pa'i tshigs legs par sgrub pa sarvatantrāpratihatapadasampradhāraṇa
1789 D D mna' las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs śāpavijayasādhana

1793 D D sgrub bya gza'i byad du gzhug pa'i 'khor lo can sādhyagrahābhicārikacakrikā
1794 D D the tshom med par 'grub pa las sgrub bya thog gis bsad pa'i cho ga drag shul zhes bya ba sādhyakarmāsaṃśayasiddhiaśanighātaraudravidhi-nāma
1795 D D bsgrub bya skrag pa'i las chu thigs zhes bya ba sādhyaraudrakarman jalabindu-nāma
1796 D D 'gal ba skrag par byed pa'i las sna tshogs pa'i cho ga mgal pa me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba gal ba skrag par byed pa'i las sna tshogs pa'i cho ga mgal pa me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba viśvavirodhaghorakarmavidhī-alātacakra-nāma

1798 D D gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gi ri bo zhes bya ba paravidyāstambhanakāñcanagiri-nāma
1799 D D las thams cad 'joms pa'i ye shes 'dus pa'i tho ba zhes bya ba sarvakarmasūdanajñānasamājamudgara-nāma
1800 D D gzhan gyi rig sngags bshig pa'i phyir bzlog pa paravidyānāśanapratyarthaka-nāma
1801 D D gzhan gyi las 'jigs par byed pa rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba parakarmavidhīṣaṇavajratīkṣṇa-nāma
1802 D D mu stegs can gyi rig sngags 'jig pa'i bsgrub pa nye ba'i las phyi ma zhes bya ba tīrthikavidyādhvaṃsasādhana-uttaropakaraṇa-nāma
1803 D D gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa rdo rje tho ba zhes bya ba sarvabhūtotsādanavajramudgara-nāma
1804 D D lha'i gdon las thar par byed pa'i man ngag devagrahanirmocakopadeśa
1805 D D 'byung po'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ba bhūtagraha-nirmocakopadeśa
1806 D D dri za'i gdon las thar par nges pa gandharvagraha-nirmocakopadeśa
1807 D D tshangs pa'i gdon thams cad las thar par nges pa sarvabrahma-graha-nirmocakopadeśa
1808 D D srin po'i gdon las thar nges pa sran po'i gdon las thar nges pa rākṣasagrahanirmocakopadeśa
1809 D D sha za'i gdon las nges par thar pa piśācagrahanirmocakopadeśa
1810 D D klu'i gdon las thar par nges pa nāgagrahanirmocakopadeśa

1814 D D lha ma yin gyi gdon las thar par nges pa asuragrahanirmocakopadeśa
1815 D D gzhon nu'i gdon bzhi las thar par byed pa'i man ngag catuṣkumāragrahanirmocakopadeśa
1816 D D gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar par byed pa'i man ngag yakṣagrahanirmocakopadeśa

1818 D D rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa'i las kyi bye brag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bkod pa yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba sarvavidyākarmakārakadvicatvāriṃśatkarmaviśeṣavyūhakanakacintāmaṇi-nāma
1819 D D gzungs sngags kyi las ma grub pa rnams 'grub par byed pa rdo rje be con zhes bya ba sarvāsiddhadhāraṇīkarmasādhanavajragadā-nāma
1820 D D gzungs sngags kyi las grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa rin po che'i gter sgrub zhes bya ba sarvasiddhadhāraṇīkarma-vipraṇāśīkaraṇaratnasiddhanidhi-nāma
1821 D D klu'i las char dbad pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba nāgakarmavṛṣṭyamṛtadhārā-nāma
1822 D D klu rnams mnyes par byed pa'i chu la brten pa'i gtor ma bdud rtsi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba sarvanāgārādhanajalāśrayabalyamṛtasāgara-nāma
1823 D D sems can bsrung ba'i las sprin bral ba'i 'byung ba gcod byed ces bya ba sattvarakṣākarmanirmeghodayakṣura-nāma
1824 D D byis pa gdon las thar par byed pa'i sgrub pa gsang ba me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bālagrahanirmocakasādhanaguhyāgnicakra-nāma
1825 D D zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyud zhi ba'i mtshan don śāntihomavidhitantraśāntivyañjana
1826 D D rgyud kyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms kyi rgyas par byed pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga puṣṭitantra-nāma-padasampradhāraṇavajravidāraṇīpauṣṭikahomavidhi
1827 D D 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las myur bar byes pa'i las cho ga āryavajravidāraṇīkaramāśukārikarmavidhi
1828 D D sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa'i las jag chings 'phrul yig ces bya ba sarvasattvastambhanakarman caurabandhanakavaca-nāma
1829 D D bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi zhags pa zhes bya ba viśvasādhyastambhanakarmopadeśānilapāśa-nāma
1830 D D bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byad du gzhug pa'i cho ga srog gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba sādhyasarvanāgābhicārasaṃkalpavidhi prāṇacchedanakṣura-nāma
1831 D D tsha ba'i rims kyis dgra bsad pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba śatrumāradāhajvarakhaḍgacakra-nāma
1832 D D sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' gzi mdangs chen mo zhes bya ba sarvasattvajambhanasādhanamahādīpti-nāma
1833 D D dpal bkra shis bskyed pa nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba dpal kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i mtha' śrīmaṅgalotpādanasūryaprabhā-nāma-śrīviśvamaṇḍanaparyanta
1834 D D mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba kṣīṇacakṣurindriyacikitsāvidhiprakāśāloka-nāma
1835 D D rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso ba'i cho ga sgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba kṣīṇakarṇendriyarogacikitsāvidhiśabdavijaya-nāma
1836 D D sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba kṣīṇanāsendriyarogacikitsānirmalaśundhana-nāma
1837 D D lce'i dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga pad+ma rgyas pa zhe bya ba kṣīṇajihvendriyacikitsāvidhipariphullapadma-nāma
1838 D D lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dang lus na ba gso ba'i cho ga rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba kṣīṇaśarīrendriyaśarīrarogacikitsāvidhivajradhvaja-nāma
1839 D D tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba kṣīṇāyurdīrghīkaraṇavidhidhārācakra-nāma
1840 D D shi ba'i sems can sdig pa las thar bar byed pa'i ro sreg pa'i cho ga dug sbyangs gsal ba'i me long mṛtasattvapāpanirmocakaśavasaṃskāravidhiviśaśuddhiprakāśadarpaṇna-nāma
1841 D D mchod rten la gdab pa shi ba'i sdig pa badyng bar byed pa rang 'byung 'jigs bral zhes bya ba mṛtakapāpaśodhanacaityanirvapaṇa-svayambhūbhayaparityāga-nāma
1842 D D sems can tshe zad pa bring ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa padma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba sems can tshe zad pa bring ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa pad+ma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba kṣīṇasattvāyurdīrghīkaraṇasiddhavidhihiraṇyapadmasiddhi-nāma
1843 D D dal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa bcud kyi len pa zhes bya ba mahākṣaṇasamṛddhisādhanarasāyana-nāma
1844 D D lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba durdaivaparihārabalikarmankalpadruma-nāma
1845 D D longs spyod dang ldan par nges pa'i dpal tshogs kyi gtor ma rin po che legs phreng zhes bya ba dhruvasambhogāpannaśrīgaṇabaliśubhamaṇimālā-nāma
1846 D D phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba trisamṛddhakarmasiddhyupakrama karmasaṃbhārasahasrapauṣṭika-nāma
